entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Outlook
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -24.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Outlook 04:00 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: -24.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -27.4°C
Wind: W 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023
